name: Morse_Scroll
description:
Vertical Scrolling Shooter + Educational/Puzzle

Dodge missiles while launching attacks using morse code on enemy ships. Destroy ships to earn points.

CONTROLS:
 A and D to steer plane LEFT and RIGHT  Press R to Restart

 MORSE CONTROLS:
 Use  "."  key to type a "."
 Use  ","  key to type a "_"
 ENTER key to execute launch

 e.g. To attack at position A3
 ( Where A  is  "._"  and 3 is  "...__" )
 Type " ._...__ " and press Enter

 SPECIAL:
 T for Torpedo.  e.g To use Torpedo at position 3,
 type "_...__" and press ENTER
 (Where T is "_"  and 3 is "...__" )
